locales.plugin_description: Changes timelimit dynamically depending on the next map\'s author time.
locales.message_default: {#server}»{#emotic} Set default timelimit for Map {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} to {#highlite}{2}{#emotic}, calculation based upon the {#highlite}{3}{#emotic} of {#highlite}{4}
locales.message_new: {#server}»{#emotic} Set new timelimit for Map {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} to {#highlite}{2}{#emotic}, calculation based upon the {#highlite}{3}{#emotic} of {#highlite}{4}
locales.message_minimum: {#server}»{#emotic} Set minimum timelimit for Map {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} to {#highlite}{2}{#emotic}, calculation based upon the {#highlite}{3}{#emotic} of {#highlite}{4}
locales.message_maximum: {#server}»{#emotic} Set maximum timelimit for Map {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} to {#highlite}{2}{#emotic}, calculation based upon the {#highlite}{3}{#emotic} of {#highlite}{4}
